about.title: About Suntop AI
paragraphs: Suntop AI is an AI, IoT, and automation company focused exclusively on dialysis. We are building the operating system for next-generation dialysis care.

Dialysis is one of the most data-intensive medical procedures, yet most of that data remains underutilized. Clinical variability leads to preventable adverse events. Scaling dialysis networks increases operational risk and inconsistency.

We address this gap by integrating dialysis machines, patient vitals, and clinical workflows through a unified AI platform that transforms real-time data into clinical intelligence and assisted automation.

Our approach is dialysis-native, not adapted from generic healthcare AI. We focus on deep integration at the machine and workflow level, with automation that includes clinical guardrails and physician oversight by design.
